name: extensions-logging
description: Guidance for Microsoft.Extensions.Logging and LoggerMessage source generators. USE FOR: ILogger abstraction, LoggerMessage source-generated logging, structured logging with event IDs, log filtering and configuration, high-performance logging patterns. DO NOT USE FOR: Serilog-specific sinks and enrichers (use serilog), NLog-specific targets and routing (use nlog), OpenTelemetry log export (use otlp-logging).
author: Tyler-R-Kendrick
